items.content_html: This Weather App is a lightweight and easy-to-use web application that provides real-time weather updates for any location worldwide. Users can input a city name, and the app fetches the temperature and weather conditions using the WeatherAPI.

items.content_html: A lightweight virtual assistant built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to perform small yet essential tasks. It features a clean, user-friendly interface and can be easily customized or extended with additional functionalities to enhance productivity. Perfect for quick, everyday tasks!

items.content_html: CrabJs is a lightweight JavaScript framework designed to simplify DOM manipulation, AJAX requests, and canvas operations. It provides a jQuery-like API for working with HTML elements and includes built-in support for animations and event handling.
